articles.description: Follow live coverage of match week four in the Champions League as Aston Villa travel to Club Brugge looking to make it four wins from four and Shakhtar Donetsk host Young Boys followed by seven other fixtures including Arsenal's trip to Inter Milan.
articles.title: Champions League LIVE: Club Brugge v Aston Villa - score, line-ups & updates

articles.description: Donald Trump's return to the White House can help pave the way for peace in golf's 'civil war', says four-time major champion Rory McIlroy.
articles.title: Donald Trump and Elon Musk can bring PGA Tour and LIV Golf together, says Rory McIlroy

articles.description: Manchester United's incoming head coach Ruben Amorim reflects on a dream departure from Sporting, but warns of "different world" in the Premier League.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Man Utd's new boss plays down expectations after beating Man City

articles.description: Zheng Qinwen crushes Jasmine Paolini to secure a place in the WTA Finals last four on her tournament debut.
articles.title: WTA Finals: Zheng Qinwen crushes Jasmine Paolini to reach semi-finals; Aryna Sabalenka faces Elena Rybakina

articles.description: The FA and FAI are fined after the booing of both national anthems before England's Nations League match against Republic of Ireland in September.
articles.title: Uefa fines FA and FAI after England and Republic of Ireland fans boo anthems

articles.description: Tadhg Furlong is ruled out of Ireland's opening autumn Test against the All Blacks on Friday because of injury.
articles.title: Ireland v New Zealand: Tadhg Furlong ruled out of Dublin Test but Ronan Kelleher starts

articles.description: We look at six of the biggest storylines from the first half of the 2024 NFL season from the best and worst performers to who shows signs of being play-off dark horses.
articles.title: NFL mid-season review: Chiefs' dynasty, Jayden Daniels and Derrick Henry among six big storylines

articles.description: Karen Wiltshire was assaulted and ridiculed but went on to become the first professional female jockey to ride a winner in British Flat racing.
articles.title: Karen Wiltshire: Pioneering female jockey on overcoming abuse and ridicule

articles.description: Andre Onana says Manchester United's players will have 'no issue' adapting to Ruben Amorim's tactics.
articles.title: Manchester United players will 'step up' to Ruben Amorim's tactics, says Andre Onana

articles.description: Former Manchester City defender Benjamin Mendy should have been paid when he was not in custody, an employment tribunal judge rules.
articles.title: Man City: Benjamin Mendy will receive majority of unpaid salary - judge
